keyMoments.title: Trapped by General Zombies
keyMoments.description: Three members of the crew (Luffy, Robin, and Franky) are lured into a trap and forced to battle General Zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew being systematically separated and overwhelmed by Moria's forces.

keyMoments.title: Captain Captured
keyMoments.description: Luffy is captured and sealed in a coffin, separated from Robin and Franky.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's captain is captured, representing a critical moment of vulnerability for the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Ship Raided
keyMoments.description: The Thousand Sunny is raided by Perona while the crew is trapped in Hogback's mansion.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's ship and resources are vulnerable with no one to defend them.

flagDescription: A skull with a straw hat

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Jigoro Deployed
keyMoments.description: General Zombie Jigoro, one of Moria's elite soldiers, makes his first appearance in battle.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strategic deployment of General Zombies with stolen shadows of strong fighters.

keyMoments.title: Tararan Deployed
keyMoments.description: General Zombie Tararan, Commander of the Spider Mice, appears to block the Straw Hats' escape.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's coordinated effort to trap and separate the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Capture Luffy
keyMoments.description: The General Zombies successfully capture Monkey D. Luffy in a sealed coffin.
keyMoments.significance: Major tactical victory for Thriller Bark Pirates in their battle against the Straw Hats.
